languages.text: {n}Между вами всего пара шагов, но путь к Ирлиэт преграждает невидимая стена, словно выстроенная изо льда.{/n} "Не смешите, Вольный Торговец. Что за особая связь могла возникнуть между небом и землей? Океаном и жалкой лужей? Звезда никогда не увидит света ничтожного светлячка, как бы яростно он не старался достигнуть небосвода".

traits.locale_text: {n}Между вами всего пара шагов, но путь к Ирлиэт преграждает невидимая стена, словно выстроенная изо льда.{/n} "Не смешите, Вольный Торговец. Что за особая связь могла возникнуть между небом и землей? Океаном и жалкой лужей? Звезда никогда не увидит света ничтожного светлячка, как бы яростно он не старался достигнуть небосвода".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}There are only a couple of steps between you, but the path to Yrliet is blocked by an invisible wall, cold as if built of impenetrable ice.{/n} "Do not be ridiculous, Rogue Trader. What special bond could arise between heaven and earth? Between an ocean and a puddle? A star will never see the light of a puny firefly, no matter how hard it tries to reach the sky."
languages.original_text: {n}Между вами всего пара шагов, но путь к Ирлиэт преграждает невидимая стена, словно выстроенная изо льда.{/n} "Не смешите, Вольный Торговец. Что за особая связь могла возникнуть между небом и землей? Океаном и жалкой лужей? Звезда никогда не увидит света ничтожного светлячка, как бы яростно он не старался достигнуть небосвода".

traits.locale_text: {n}There is only a couple of steps between you, but the way to Yrliet is blocked by an invisible wall, cold as if built of impenetrable ice.{/n} "Do not make me laugh, Rogue Trader. What special bond could appear between the heaven and the earth? The ocean and a puddle? A star will never see the light of a poor firefly no matter how stubbornly it tries to reach the sky."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

What special bond could arise between heaven and earth? Between an ocean and a puddle? A star will never see the light of a puny firefly, no matter how hard it tries to reach the sky."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}There are only a couple of steps between you, but the path to Yrliet is blocked by an invisible wall, cold as if built of impenetrable ice.{/n} "Do not be ridiculous, Rogue Trader. What special bond could arise between heaven and earth? Between an ocean and a puddle? A star will never see the light of a puny firefly, no matter how hard it tries to reach the sky."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Bien qu'elle se trouve à quelques pas, un mur invisible et froid comme s'il était fait de glace vous sépare d'Yrliet.{/n} « Ne soyez pas ridicule, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Quelle relation spéciale pourrait-il y avoir entre la terre et les cieux ? Une flaque et un océan ? Une étoile ne verra jamais la lumière d'une minuscule luciole, quels que soient les efforts qu'elle déploie pour atteindre le ciel. »
languages.original_text: {n}There are only a couple of steps between you, but the path to Yrliet is blocked by an invisible wall, cold as if built of impenetrable ice.{/n} "Do not be ridiculous, Rogue Trader. What special bond could arise between heaven and earth? Between an ocean and a puddle? A star will never see the light of a puny firefly, no matter how hard it tries to reach the sky."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bien qu'elle se trouve à quelques pas, un mur invisible et froid comme s'il était fait de glace vous sépare d'Yrliet.{/n} « Ne soyez pas ridicule, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Quelle relation spéciale pourrait-il y avoir entre la terre et les cieux ? Une flaque et un océan ? Une étoile ne verra jamais la lumière d'une minuscule luciole, quels que soient les efforts qu'elle déploie pour atteindre le ciel. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}尽管你们之间只有几步之遥，但伊莉耶特似乎站在一堵看不见的高墙后面，仿佛是用坚不可摧的寒冰砌成的。{/n}“别胡说了，行商浪人。你我有着云泥之别，海洋与水坑真的会有什么联系吗？渺小的萤火虫哪怕再怎么想飞上天空，群星也看不到它微弱的光芒。”
languages.original_text: {n}There are only a couple of steps between you, but the path to Yrliet is blocked by an invisible wall, cold as if built of impenetrable ice.{/n} "Do not be ridiculous, Rogue Trader. What special bond could arise between heaven and earth? Between an ocean and a puddle? A star will never see the light of a puny firefly, no matter how hard it tries to reach the sky."

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管你们之间只有几步之遥，但伊莉耶特似乎站在一堵看不见的高墙后面，仿佛是用坚不可摧的寒冰砌成的。{/n}“别胡说了，行商浪人。你我有着云泥之别，海洋与水坑真的会有什么联系吗？渺小的萤火虫哪怕再怎么想飞上天空，群星也看不到它微弱的光芒。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}2人の間には、ほんの数歩しか隔たりがないものの、ユリエットとはまるで強固な氷で作られたかのような見えない壁に阻まれている。{/n}「バカなことを言うな、自由開拓者よ。天と地の間にどんな特別な絆があるというのだ？海と水たまりか？星は決して、ちっぽけなホタルの光を見ることはない。それがいかに頑張って空に届こうとしても」
languages.original_text: {n}There are only a couple of steps between you, but the path to Yrliet is blocked by an invisible wall, cold as if built of impenetrable ice.{/n} "Do not be ridiculous, Rogue Trader. What special bond could arise between heaven and earth? Between an ocean and a puddle? A star will never see the light of a puny firefly, no matter how hard it tries to reach the sky."

traits.locale_text: {n}2人の間には、ほんの数歩しか隔たりがないものの、ユリエットとはまるで強固な氷で作られたかのような見えない壁に阻まれている。{/n}「バカなことを言うな、自由開拓者よ。天と地の間にどんな特別な絆があるというのだ？海と水たまりか？星は決して、ちっぽけなホタルの光を見ることはない。それがいかに頑張って空に届こうとしても」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ihr steht nur wenige Meter voneinander entfernt, aber der Weg zu Yrliet ist versperrt durch eine unsichtbare Wand, die sich wie ein undurchdringlicher Eisblock anfühlt.{/n} "Macht Euch nicht lächerlich, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Welche besondere Verbindung kann schon zwischen Himmel und Erde entstehen? Zwischen einem Ozean und einer Pfütze? Das Licht eines kümmerlichen Glühwürmchens wird niemals bis zu den Sternen vordringen, egal wie sehr es sich bemüht, den Himmel zu erreichen."
languages.original_text: {n}There are only a couple of steps between you, but the path to Yrliet is blocked by an invisible wall, cold as if built of impenetrable ice.{/n} "Do not be ridiculous, Rogue Trader. What special bond could arise between heaven and earth? Between an ocean and a puddle? A star will never see the light of a puny firefly, no matter how hard it tries to reach the sky."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ihr steht nur wenige Meter voneinander entfernt, aber der Weg zu Yrliet ist versperrt durch eine unsichtbare Wand, die sich wie ein undurchdringlicher Eisblock anfühlt.{/n} "Macht Euch nicht lächerlich, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Welche besondere Verbindung kann schon zwischen Himmel und Erde entstehen? Zwischen Ozean und Pfütze? Das Licht eines armen Glühwürmchens wird niemals bis zu den Sternen vordringen, egal wie sehr es sich abmüht, den Himmel zu erreichen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Únicamente os separan un par de pasos, pero entre Yrliet y tú hay un muro invisible tan gélido como si estuviese hecho de un hielo impenetrable.{/n} «No seas {mf|ridículo|ridícula}, Comerciante Independiente. ¿Qué vínculo especial puede surgir entre el cielo y la tierra? ¿Entre un océano y un charco? Una estrella jamás verá la luz de una triste luciérnaga por muy alto que esta se afane en volar».
languages.original_text: {n}There are only a couple of steps between you, but the path to Yrliet is blocked by an invisible wall, cold as if built of impenetrable ice.{/n} "Do not be ridiculous, Rogue Trader. What special bond could arise between heaven and earth? Between an ocean and a puddle? A star will never see the light of a puny firefly, no matter how hard it tries to reach the sky."

traits.locale_text: {n}Únicamente os separan un par de pasos, pero entre Yrliet y tú hay un muro invisible tan gélido como si estuviese hecho de un hielo impenetrable.{/n} «No seas {mf|ridículo|ridícula}, Comerciante Independiente. ¿Qué vínculo especial puede surgir entre el cielo y la tierra? ¿Entre un océano y un charco? Una estrella jamás verá la luz de una triste luciérnaga por muy alto que esta se afane en volar».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: {n}Aranızda yalnızca iki adım mesafe olsa da Yrliet; görünmez, buzdan yapılma, çok soğuk, aşılamaz bir duvarın arkasında gibi.{/n} "Saçmalama Hür Tacir. Gökyüzü ile yeryüzü... Okyanus ile su birikintisi arasında nasıl bir bağ oluşabilir ki? Küçük bir ateş böceği, göğe ulaşmak için ne kadar çabalarsa çabalasın ışığını bir yıldıza gösteremez."
languages.original_text: {n}There are only a couple of steps between you, but the path to Yrliet is blocked by an invisible wall, cold as if built of impenetrable ice.{/n} "Do not be ridiculous, Rogue Trader. What special bond could arise between heaven and earth? Between an ocean and a puddle? A star will never see the light of a puny firefly, no matter how hard it tries to reach the sky."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aranızda yalnızca iki adım mesafe var ama Yrliet görünmez bir duvarın arkasında gibi. Buzdan yapılma, çok soğuk, aşılamaz bir duvar.{/n} "Saçmalama Hür Tacir. Gökyüzü ve yeryüzü arasında nasıl bir bağ oluşabilir ki? Bir okyanus ve bir su birikintisi arasında? Bir yıldız, küçük bir ateş böceğinin ışığını asla göremez. Gökyüzüne ulaşmak için ne kadar çok çalışırsa çalışsın."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
